revisionDesc.change: Add dummy header for original identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/sb;1;5556' pointing to new identifier 'papyri.info/ddbdp/p.kru;;2'

Vote - AcceptText - Lin6=> ⲛⲣⲙ ⲛ ; lin9=> ⲉⲓⲣ ϩⲟⲩⲟ ; lin11=> ⲡⲣⲙ ⲡⲉⲛ ; lin12=> <:πείθειν=grc|reg|ⲡⲓⲑⲉ:> : lin14=> I agree, a Greek sequence is better ; lin15=> ⲙⲛ ⲡϣⲏⲣⲉ ⲙⲛ ⲡⲉ (space after ⲙⲛ) ; lin21=> ⲧⲁⲣⲉⲕϣⲟⲟⲡⲉ ; lin23=> ⲛⲥⲁ ⲥⲁ ; lin25=> ⲡⲓⲉⲃⲉⲧ ; write Αὐθέντης (proper name ?) ?; lin27=> ⲛⲡⲕⲉⲕⲁϩ ⲛⲉ ; write Αὐθέντης (proper name ?) ?; lin29=> ⲉⲡ<#ϥⲧⲟⲩ=4#> ⲥⲁ; lin30=> ⲁⲥⲣ ⲁⲛⲁⲛ ; <#ⲥⲛⲁⲩ=2#> ⲡⲉ <#ϣⲟⲙⲛⲧ=3#> ; lin36=> ⲉⲟⲩⲉϩⲙ ϫⲡⲟⲟⲩ ; lin40=> ⲉϣ ϭⲙ ϭⲟⲙ ; lin43=> ⲛⲛⲉⲡⲉⲧⲙⲙⲁⲩ (contra previous voter) ϯ ϩⲏⲩ ; lin46=> ⲛ<#ϫⲟⲩⲱⲧ=20#> ; lin48=> ϥⲟⲣⲉϫ ϥϭⲙ ϭⲟⲙ ϩⲙ ; lin54=> ⲡ<:ἐλάχιστος=grc|reg|(ⲉⲗⲁⲭ(ⲓⲥ)ⲧ(ⲟⲥ)):>
Automated transfer of accents across reg-orig pairs
batch converted all tei:sic to tei:orig and tei:corr to tei:reg
changed schema; added xml:space=preserve; indented; moved title/@n to idno
Converted from TEI P4 (EpiDoc DTD v. 6) to P5 (EpiDoc RNG schema)
